name: RTCRtpSender.transport
description: The read-only transport property of an RTCRtpSender object provides the RTCDtlsTransport object used to interact with the underlying transport over which the sender is exchanging Real-time Transport Control Protocol (RTCP) packets.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCRtpSender.transport' in WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers.
